markdown.markdown:
------------------------------------------------------------------------

-   **Developing an Edited Volume and Online Resources for Programming Pedagogy Across Disciplines**\
    [PTAS funded project](https://pairprogramming.ed.ac.uk/category/book/), January 2025 - 2026

-   **Fostering Student-Staff collaboration for Generative AI literacy toolkit**\
    Student Experience Grant project, January-December 2025

-   **LLMs for Data Science: Are they ready for Data science?**\
    [GAIL seed funded project](https://github.com/oevkaya/GAIL-DS-project), January-July 2025
    
-   **GAIL: Generative Creative Visions initiative seed funding**\
    [GAIL seed fund-interdisciplinary project](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1NNaQbc622FgZwe2SxTUQpE3N0Ec53WWI), March-July 2025

### SoR / SwDS Dissertation Projects {.test}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

-   **Understanding factors of Dementia in depth: Explainable AI (XAI) approach**\
    Supervising Kezheng Wang, SoR MSc Thesis, Summer 2024

-   **Wavelet based copula approach for modeling market risk: Turkey ISE-100 Case Study**\
    Supervising Xin Wang, SoR MSc Thesis, Summer 2024

-   **Understanding the product performance of Fouling Control Coatings**\
    SwDS MSc Thesis with groups - External: AkzoNobel, Summer 2023

-   **Evaluating Students Attitudes towards Statistics**\
    Supervising Shuyu Liu, SoR MSc Thesis, Summer 2022

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### UG Final Year Projects {.test}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

-   **Clustering Dementia Characteristics Using Vine Copula Mixture Models**\
    Supervising Mellow Chen, 2024-2025

-   **Machine Learning Meets Hospitality: Explainable AI in Hotel Booking Cancellations**\
    Supervising Reuben Forman, Jiajun Li and Yuhang Zheng 2024-2025

-   **Experimenting on Portfolio Allocations: Turkey ISE100 Financial Market**\
    Supervising Duru Kilkisli (individual), Niall Baxter, Mark Corray and Yuxuan Qian (group), UG group project, 2024-2025

-   **Turkey Stock market Dependencies: Study based on wavelet-vine copula approach**\
    Supervising Tim Xu, Huari Yang and Maiyue Xu, UG group project, 2023-2024

-   **Starting journey for Explainable and Responsible Artificial Intelligence: Experiments on Insurance Data**\
    Supervising Richard Huang and Callum Purcell, UG group project, 2023-2024

-   **Nonparametric copula based drought analysis**\
    Supervising Hongyi Lu, UG project, 2022-2023

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Others {.test}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

-   **Exploiting clustering with vine copulas to examine the Scottish Multiple Deprivation Index 2020 (SIMD-2020)**\
    [MIORPA (Mathematical Institute’s Online Research Projects with Africa)](https://www.maths.ox.ac.uk/outreach/miorpa), July-September 2025

-   **Text2Text and Text2Image Landscape**\
    [Turkish Mathematics Assocation - Direct Reading Program with Yagmur Seda Sankutlu](https://sites.google.com/view/drpturkiye/previous-programs/summer-2024/symposium), July-August 2024
    
-   **Evidence of Turkish Stock Market movements during COVID-19 Pandemic: A Wavelet-Vine-GARCH method**\
    University of Edinburgh - Vacation Scholarship with Stefano Lema, Summer 2024

-   **Understanding LLMs and GenAI**\
    [Turkish Mathematics Assocation - Direct Reading Program with Emre Anıl Oguz](https://sites.google.com/view/drp-turkey/previous-programs/summer-2023/symposium), July-August 2023

-   **Application of Algorithmic Trading in Portfolio Optimization**\
    University of Edinburgh - Vacation Scholarship with Rishabh Ramruttun, Summer 2023
